<Link id="l00244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="244"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;RemVecTy = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;FixedVectorType&gt;</a>(VS.RemainderTy))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="245"><Highlight kind="normal">        NumPacked = RemVecTy-&gt;getNumElements();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="246"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="247"><Highlight kind="normal">        NumPacked = 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="248"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="249"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="250"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (NumPacked == 1) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="251"><Highlight kind="normal">      Res = Builder.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#a17320ebd77e834577a5ebd1063039625">CreateInsertElement</a>(Res, Fragment, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> &#42; VS.NumPacked,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="252"><Highlight kind="normal">                                        Name + </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;.upto&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> + <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/twine">Twine</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="253"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="254"><Highlight kind="normal">      Fragment = Builder.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#aa226d30eebf99ef84a0c2b1afcfc98b2">CreateShuffleVector</a>(Fragment, Fragment, ExtendMask);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="255"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> == 0) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="256"><Highlight kind="normal">        Res = Fragment;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="257"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="258"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> J = 0; J &lt; NumPacked; ++J)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="259"><Highlight kind="normal">          InsertMask&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> &#42; VS.NumPacked + J&#93; = NumElements + J;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="260"><Highlight kind="normal">        Res = Builder.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#aa226d30eebf99ef84a0c2b1afcfc98b2">CreateShuffleVector</a>(Res, Fragment, InsertMask,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="261"><Highlight kind="normal">                                          Name + </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;.upto&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> + <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/twine">Twine</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00262" /><CodeLine lineNumber="262"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> J = 0; J &lt; NumPacked; ++J)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00263" /><CodeLine lineNumber="263"><Highlight kind="normal">          InsertMask&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> &#42; VS.NumPacked + J&#93; = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> &#42; VS.NumPacked + J;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00264" /><CodeLine lineNumber="264"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00265" /><CodeLine lineNumber="265"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00266" /><CodeLine lineNumber="266"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00267" /><CodeLine lineNumber="267"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00268" /><CodeLine lineNumber="268"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Res;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00269" /><CodeLine lineNumber="269"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00722" /><CodeLine lineNumber="722"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This case does not seem to happen, but it is possible for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00723" /><CodeLine lineNumber="723"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// VectorSplit.NumPacked &gt;= NumElems. If that happens a VectorSplit</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00724" /><CodeLine lineNumber="724"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// is not returned and we will bailout of handling this call.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00725" /><CodeLine lineNumber="725"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The secondary bailout case is if NumPacked does not match.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00726" /><CodeLine lineNumber="726"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This can happen if ScalarizeMinBits is not set to the default.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00727" /><CodeLine lineNumber="727"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This means with certain ScalarizeMinBits intrinsics like frexp</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00728" /><CodeLine lineNumber="728"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// will only scalarize when the struct elements have the same bitness.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00729" /><CodeLine lineNumber="729"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!CurrVS || CurrVS-&gt;NumPacked != VS-&gt;NumPacked)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00730" /><CodeLine lineNumber="730"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00732" /><CodeLine lineNumber="732"><Highlight kind="normal">        Tys.push&#95;back(CurrVS-&gt;SplitTy);</Highlight></CodeLine>
